hero.mainTitle: Welcome to the world of perfect doors!
hero.text: Durability, style, and functionality – doors that will transform your home.

about.text1: Welcome to TwójSlotDrzwi – where quality meets design. Our doors are more than just a home feature; they are an expression of style and functionality for your house.
about.text2: We offer a wide range of doors: from classic to modern, tailored to fit any interior and meet our clients' needs. Quality and precision craftsmanship are our hallmarks.

services.desc1: Our doors are made from the highest quality materials, ensuring long life and reliability.
services.desc2: We offer doors tailored to your individual needs, in various sizes and styles.
services.desc3: We guarantee express delivery to ensure your doors arrive on time and in perfect condition.

products.text1: Elegant doors with a timeless style, perfect for any interior.
products.text2: Minimalist doors that emphasize the modern character of your home.
products.text3: Practical and stylish solutions, ideal for saving space.

review.desc1: The doors ordered from TwójSlotDrzwi were perfect! Beautifully designed and solidly made. Highly recommend!
review.desc2: I ordered modern doors for my apartment, and they are fantastic! Great design and fast delivery.
review.desc3: Sliding doors from TwójSlotDrzwi are the best choice. High quality and perfect fit for my interior.
review.desc4: Excellent service and an amazing selection of doors. I will definitely come back for more!
review.desc5: The classic doors ordered from TwójSlotDrzwi made a great impression on my friends. Highly recommend!
review.desc6: The best doors in Poland! I ordered modern doors, and I am delighted with their look and functionality.

doors.desc1: Elegant doors with a timeless style, perfect for any interior.
doors.desc2: Modern glass doors with a sliding mechanism, ideal for small spaces.
doors.desc3: Durable metal doors ensuring safety and longevity.
doors.desc4: Minimalist interior doors that emphasize the modern character of the home.
doors.desc5: Practical folding doors, perfect for saving space.
doors.desc6: Doors with an anti-burglary system, ensuring maximum safety.
doors.desc7: Doors with glass panels that add elegance and allow light to pass through.
doors.desc8: Soundproof doors, ideal for offices or bedrooms where silence is important.
doors.desc9: Custom-painted doors tailored to your individual needs.

cookie.text2: twójslotdrzwi.com uses cookies to enhance your experience on our website and provide more personalized services.
cookie.text3: Cookies are small files stored on your device by our website. They are used to improve website functionality and optimize user experience.
cookie.text4: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect some features of our website.
cookie.text5: By using our site, you agree to the use of cookies as described in this policy. If you have questions about cookies, contact us at kontakt@twójslotdrzwi.com
cookie.item1: To monitor the performance of our website and improve your user experience.
cookie.item2: To remember your settings, allowing us to deliver better services.
cookie.item3: Necessary cookies: Required for basic website functionality, such as remembering your shopping cart or login details.
cookie.item4: Analytical cookies: Used to monitor how you use the site and improve its performance.

warunki.text2: Welcome to the twójslotdrzwi.com website. By using our site, you agree to the following terms of use.
warunki.text3: All content on this website, including photos and logos, is the property of twójslotdrzwi.com. Using content without our permission is prohibited.
warunki.text4: We are not responsible for any damages resulting from the use of our site or services.
warunki.text5: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Continuing to use the site after changes indicates acceptance of the new terms.
warunki.text6: If you have any questions, contact us at kontakt@twójslotdrzwi.com
warunki.item1: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services and make purchases.
warunki.item2: You agree to use our site in accordance with applicable laws.

privacy.text2: twójslotdrzwi.com (we, our, us) respects your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when using our website.
privacy.text3: We do not share your personal data with third parties unless required by law.
privacy.text4: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website and provide more personalized services.
privacy.text5: We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data.
privacy.text6: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data.
privacy.text7: If you have questions about privacy, please contact us at kontakt@twójslotdrzwi.com
privacy.item1: Personal data you provide (name, email address, etc.).

cookieBanner.text: This site uses cookies to ensure a better browsing experience and tailor content to your needs.
